items.question: Where can I park?
items.answer: Free parking is available around the apartments at Phönixsee. For €10/day you can also reserve a private parking spot in the courtyard. In the city center, paid garages and parking lots are within walking distance. Feel free to ask!

items.question: Are bed linens and towels provided?
items.answer: Yes – bed linens and towels are available.

items.question: Can I get an invoice?
items.answer: Yes. Just call or email wohnenaufzeitdortmund@gmail.com.

items.question: How long can I stay?
items.answer: We offer stays from 1 day to 6 months. Extensions are always possible.

items.question: When is check-in & check-out?
items.answer: Check-in from 3 PM, check-out until 12 PM. Custom times available on request – just let us know.

items.question: How do I access the apartment?
items.answer: You get self check-in via keybox or door code. You’ll receive instructions 24 hours before arrival.
